main.name: Zakaria Akhfas
main.bio: My name is Akhfas. I want to contribute with the skills I have and want to move forward with the ideas I have. Because I had experience as a web developer, social organization and education when I was in college. Evidently I have made several projects and developed them again. It is proven by several projects that I have worked on such as the E-Learning website I am currently looking for a full time job as a Web Developer in the IT and Telecommunications industry. On the other hand, I often do freelance work building E-Commerce websites and logo design.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.
